SPECIAL.name: Can be picked up
SPECIAL.description: This thing can be picked up.

SOLID.name: Obstacle
SOLID.description: This thing blocks other things from moving through it.

SHOOTABLE.name: Shootable
SHOOTABLE.description: This thing can get hit by projectiles and hitscan weapons.

NOSECTOR.name: Invisible & touchable
NOSECTOR.description: This thing is invisible, but touchable.

NOBLOCKMAP.name: Visible & untouchable
NOBLOCKMAP.description: This thing is visible, but untouchable.

AMBUSH.name: Deaf (ambush)
AMBUSH.description: This thing cannot be woken up by sounds, only by sight (internal flag).

JUSTHIT.name: Attack right back
JUSTHIT.description: This thing is going to attack right after being attacked itself (internal flag).

JUSTATTACKED.name: Steps before attack
JUSTATTACKED.description: This thing is going to take a single step before it attacks (internal flag).

SPAWNCEILING.name: Spawned on ceiling
SPAWNCEILING.description: This thing will spawn hanging from the ceiling.

NOGRAVITY.name: No gravity
NOGRAVITY.description: This thing is not affected by gravity.

DROPOFF.name: Travels over cliffs
DROPOFF.description: This thing is able to travel over height differences bigger than 24 units.

PICKUP.name: Picks up items
PICKUP.description: This thing can pick up other things that can be picked up.

NOCLIP.name: No clipping
NOCLIP.description: This thing can move through walls and through blocking obstacles.

SLIDE.name: Keep wall-slide info
SLIDE.description: This thing will remember wall-sliding information (internal flag).

TELEPORT.name: Semi no-clipping
TELEPORT.description: This thing can walk through obstacles, but not through walls.

DROPPED.name: Dropped by enemy
DROPPED.description: This thing was dropped dropped by an enemy (internal flag).

SHADOW.name: Draw as shadow
SHADOW.description: This thing is drawn using the Spectre fuzz effect.

NOBLOOD.name: Puffs (vs. bleeds)
NOBLOOD.description: This thing emits puffs when hit instead of blood splats.

CORPSE.name: Corpse slides off steps
CORPSE.description: This thing slides off steps (internal flag).

INFLOAT.name: No auto-levelling
INFLOAT.description: This thing won't automatically get equal to the floor's level.

COUNTKILL.name: Affects kill %
COUNTKILL.description: This thing counts towards the 'killed' percentage in the intermission screen.

COUNTITEM.name: Affects item %
COUNTITEM.description: This thing counts towards the 'items' percentage in the intermission screen.

SKULLFLY.name: Flying skull
SKULLFLY.description: This thing is a skull (Lost Soul) in mid-flight (internal flag).

NOTDMATCH.name: Not in deathmatch
NOTDMATCH.description: This thing won't be spawned during deathmatch.

TRANSLATION.name: Color 1 (grey\red)
TRANSLATION.description: This thing's green colors will be mapped to grey (or red if the Color 2 flag is also set).

UNUSED1.name: Color 2 (brown\red)
UNUSED1.description: This thing's green colors will be mapped to brown (or red if the Color 1 flag is also set).

161376.description: Same as the 'Fall' and 'BossDeath' actions together.
161376.name: KeenDie

161472.description:
Wait to wake up.

This causes currently sleeping monsters to wake up when they see a player.
161472.name: Look

161680.description:
Standard walking code pointer.

This chases the target object, regardless of a direct line of sight.
161680.name: Chase

162160.description: Turn to face the player's direction.
162160.name: FaceTarget

162656.description:
Check line of sight to stop firing.

If the target is no longer visible, halt firing and continue chasing it.
162656.name: CPosRefire

162720.description: Check line of sight to stop firing (Spiderdemon).
162720.name: SpidRefire

162832.description: Imp fireball shot or scratch if at close range.
162832.name: TroopAttack

163024.description: Cacodemon fireball shot or bite at close range.
163024.name: HeadAttack

163168.description: Baron of Hell or Hell Knight fireball shot or scratch if at close range.
163168.name: BruisAttack

163264.description: Launch a Revenant missile. Chance of launching a homing missile.
163264.name: SkelMissile

163360.description: A Revenant's fireball homing action. Changes the angle to point towards the target and emits a puff of smoke.
163360.name: Tracer

163776.description:
Revenant punch.

This plays the sound 'skepch' if it hits it's target.
163776.name: SkelFist

164096.description:
Arch-Vile walking code pointer.

Checks to see if there is a dead monster in front of the Arch-Vile and ressurects it if so.
164096.name: VileChase

164512.description: Keep the Arch-Vile's flame at the same position as it's target.
164512.name: Fire

164640.description: Creates an Arch-Vile flame at the target object's location.
164640.name: VileTarget

164960.description: Mancubus shot, 2 fireballs: one straight, one left.
164960.name: FatAttack1

165088.description: Mancubus shot, 2 fireballs: one straight, one right.
165088.name: FatAttack2

165216.description: Mancubus shot, 2 fireballs: one left, one right.
165216.name: FatAttack3

165408.description:
Lost soul attack.

An attack sound is REQUIRED.
165408.name: SkullAttack

166080.description:
Dead body mode.

This action enabled the object's flags Obstacle, Corpse and Dropoff.
166080.name: Fall

166096.description: Damage objects inside the explosion radius.
166096.name: Explode

166128.description:
Magic.

Do special effects based on map number and enemy type.
166128.name: BossDeath

166704.description: Play sound 'bosdth' and make special explosions (states 799-801) about 320 units south of the object.
166704.name: BrainScream

167008.description:
Fire a spawn cube.

A landing spot thing is REQUIRED.
167008.name: BrainSpit

167200.description:
Check for spawn point.

Spawns a monster if it hits a spawn-point.
167200.name: SpawnFly

185328.description:
Last shooting state.

If the fire button is still held, jump back to the first shooting state instead of the state with this action.
185328.name: Refire

185440.description:
Check ammo.

If there is not enough ammo for another shot, skip the reloading states and select a different weapon.
185440.name: CheckReload

185616.description: Display the weapon's firing flash sprite over the regular weapon sprite.
185616.name: GunFlash

185856.description:
Player Chainsaw attack.

Eager Beaver to the rescue!
185856.name: Saw

186992.description:
Player Chaingun shot.

Also checks ammo, does not go to -1 ammo, but changes the weapon instead.
186992.name: FireCGun

187200.description: Restore the lighting level after a gun flash.
187200.name: Light0

187232.description: Set the light flash to bright.
187232.name: Light2

187248.description:
BFG blast effect.

Casts invisible BFG rays.
187248.name: BFGSpray
